document.full_text: france pressured g8 foreign ministers on monday to agree action on libya and back its efforts to speed up a u.n. security council decision on imposing a no-fly zone in libya sought by anti-gaddafi rebels.
document.title: france pushing for swift g8 agreement on libya
lines_and_colors: france pressured g8 foreign ministers on monday to agree action on libya and back its efforts to speed up a u.n. security council decision on imposing a no-fly zone in libya sought by anti-gaddafi rebels.
